summary: A class-datum is a literal Class value.
details: Return the Class object representation of the type.
static-checks: The type specified by type must exist.
The type specified by type must be accessible.
The type specified by type must be a return-type.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    var value00 = (class void);%0A    var value01 = (class boolean);%0A    var value02 = (class char);%0A    var value03 = (class byte);%0A    var value04 = (class short);%0A    var value05 = (class int);%0A    var value06 = (class long);%0A    var value07 = (class float);%0A    var value08 = (class double);%0A    var value09 = (class String);%0A    var value10 = (class String[]);%0A    var value11 = (class String[][]);%0A    var value12 = (class String[][][]);%0A%0A    F::println(value00);%0A    F::println(value01);%0A    F::println(value02);%0A    F::println(value03);%0A    F::println(value04);%0A    F::println(value05);%0A    F::println(value06);%0A    F::println(value07);%0A    F::println(value08);%0A    F::println(value09);%0A    F::println(value10);%0A    F::println(value11);%0A    F::println(value12);%0A}
